snippet: Video of a sexual assault in Cairo prompted anguish on social networks at how routine the harassment and assault of women remains in Egypt.
lead_paragraph: Video of a sexual assault in Cairo prompted anguish on social networks at how routine the harassment and assault of women remains in Egypt.

headline.main: Outrage at ‘Epidemic’ of Sexual Assault in Egypt
